subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2539 is on the way
description_text:
Hi, my order has just arrived but I ordered the base plate only but the
vibration model has arrived instead.

Perry

conversations.body_text: Hi Perry, We apologize for the inconvenience, our new colleague mixed up your package with another customer's. We have reissued your silver plate, here is your tracking link: https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045918405331     Also, the Vam Pro 3 pac set costs £116. If you need it, we can sell it to you for £56. Would you be interested?  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730

Thanks for the update and for posting out the correct item.

I don't wish to purchase the item I received in error.

Perry



On Tue, 16 Sept 2025, 08:58 service@simsonn.com,
Hi Perry,    Please let us know if your incorrect package has been opened. We will provide you with our UK address. Please send it to this address. Thank you.
